• Tasks - the perfect place to add homework or exam reminders
• You can now tap an event while viewing your week to see more details
• Bugfixes and general improvements

• Bug fixes and general app improvements

If you enjoy using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review: it really helps.

• iPad support: it's here! Viewing and editing your timetable has never been easier
• Bug fixes and general app improvements

If you enjoy using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review: it really helps.

• iOS 8 and iPhone 6 support (Hoorah!)
• Bug fixes. We hate bugs as much as you do.
• We rebuilt iCloud sync to be more reliable. Please upgrade all of your devices to Class Timetable 5.3 for sync to work correctly.
• Brand new Notification Centre widget. Yep, it's finally here!

We’ve been busy adding a few small but great features. We hope you like them!

• Notification Sounds - you can now select what sound will play
• 3D Touch Quick Actions - create and view tasks from the home screen
• 3D Touch Peek and Pop - peek at an event by force pressing on it
• Precise Time Entry - enable this from the menu

If you enjoy using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review. It really helps!

We’ve been busy adding a few small but great features. We hope you like them!

• Notification Sounds - you can now select what sound will play
• 3D Touch Quick Actions - create and view tasks from the home screen
• 3D Touch Peek and Pop - peek at an event by force pressing on it
• Precise Time Entry - enable this from the menu

To celebrate the back to school season in some countries, we've been busy:

• Apple Watch app overhaul, including a 'complication' - see your schedule right on your watch face
• App wide design tweaks
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

If you enjoy using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review. It really helps!

## Fixed some iOS 10 related issues. The today widget also has a new look to match iOS 10.

Hey Class Timetable users! Just a small (but great) update to kick off the new year.

iPhone + iPad
--------------
• In some cases, the app didn't recognise daylight savings until the day after... Fixed.
• Exporting timetable to photo library fixed for iOS 10 devices
• Solved some minor iCloud sync issues

Apple Watch
-------------
• Improved complication behaviour: shows the current class, and switches to display the next class 10 mins after the lesson has started. Helpful if you're running late to class
• The dock image now intelligently updates to show the current day
• Some more love, performance improvements and minor bug fixes

If you enjoy using Class Timetable, please leave a nice review. It really helps!

Hey Class Timetable users! To celebrate the start of the school year in several countries, we've got an exciting update for you. Here's what's new:

• An all new look, ready for iOS 11
• Easier access to tasks
• Exporting now supports PDF, and Timetable files that you can import later (for backups, or sharing with a friend)
• Finally, fast iCloud syncing that works. Please update Class Timetable on all of your devices to enable this
• Apple Watch app now syncs via iCloud for faster, more reliable syncing
• Improved watch app launch time
• Improved support for iPad multitasking modes
• A new, more intuitive color selector
• An improved app icon
• Bugfixes and many more app wide improvements

If you like Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review - it really helps.

Class Timetable 6.1 is here, with a bunch of small (but great) improvements.

• Faster app launch times
• Multi-line classes and tasks are now supported!
• App-wide UI improvements
• If your device is set to the incorrect time, you may have noticed some odd iCloud sync behaviour. iCloud syncing now works correctly regardless of your device time
• Watch App complications display more reliably
• A number of other bug fixes and performance improvements

If you like using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review. It really helps!

This update contains several bug fixes.

• In certain configurations, the answer read by Siri would not match the displayed result - this is now fixed.
• Importing .timetable files from older app versions would occasionally fail to work. We've fixed this too.

If you like using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review. It really helps!

• Mark tasks as completed
• Bug fixes
• Support for Dutch and Hungarian languages

If you like using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review. It really helps!

'Hey Siri, what class do I have next?'

We're very excited to release Class Timetable 7.1, now with Siri Shortcut support! After a quick setup, you'll be able to ask Siri about your classes and tasks - we think you're going to love it. That's not all though:

• Automatic task colors. Tasks linked to a class now display using the same color!
• iCloud sync - we've fixed a lot of bugs to make sync more reliable than ever.
• Support for Apple Watch Series 4 complications.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you like using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave nice review. It really helps!

If you like using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a nice review. It really helps!

With the release of Class Timetable 8.1, we have added support for macOS! Search for Class Timetable on the macOS App Store, and sync your timetable across iPhone, iPad, watchOS and macOS.

Also in this release:

• Drag and drop support (landscape week view only)
• Improved iPadOS split screen support
• Bug fixes and other improvements

Class Timetable 9.0 contains the following new features:

- Support for iOS 14 widgets! View your timetable directly from your home screen. Three different widget types are available, in a number of sizes and configurations
- URL links: any links present in the 'info' section of an event are now tappable. Link directly to your course notes or online class
- We've fixed a few notable bugs, including one preventing deep-links and quick actions from working correctly in some situations
- Other minor app wide improvements

If you like using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a review - it really helps.

New in Class Timetable 9.1:

- We've added more iOS 14 home screen widgets! There are two new widget types to choose from
- The 'Today' iOS 14 widget can now be configured to display today, tomorrow, or automatically switch between the two (default). Pro tip: you can use this setting in combination with a Smart Stack widget to achieve a swipe-able today + tomorrow widget display
- Long pressing a notification will now allow you to directly open URLs entered into event info. You can use this to join online classes, open course notes, and more
- iCloud sync reliability improvements
- Bug fixes and minor improvements

If you enjoy using Class Timetable, please take a moment to leave a review - it really helps.

New in Class Timetable 10.0 - we've made significant improvements to both the event and task editor:

- Add and edit multiple events at once!
- Specifying an exact time for tasks is now optional
- Task reminders are easier to set, with several quick add options
- Bug fixes and other improvements

New in Class Timetable 13.2:

- A new extra-large home screen widget for iPad users
- Better display of concurrent events in calendar/week view
- Exporting a timetable file now offers the option to include or exclude each component (timetable, tasks, and attachments)

- Bug fixes and other improvements
